titleStmt.title: The state-reformer inquired into, in a sermon before the honourable judges at Ailesbury assises in Bucks, March 3. 1683/4 / By Francis Carswell, D.D. chaplain in ordinary to his Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Carswell, Francis, d. 1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Macock for Awnsham Churchil, at the Black-Swan near Amen-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
